Uses of Package
neqsim.process.mechanicaldesign.torg

Packages that use neqsim.process.mechanicaldesign.torg
Package
Description
neqsim.process.mechanicaldesign
 
neqsim.process.mechanicaldesign.torg
Technical Requirements Document (TORG) framework for process design.
  • Classes in neqsim.process.mechanicaldesign.torg used by neqsim.process.mechanicaldesign
    Class
    Description
    TechnicalRequirementsDocument
    Represents a Technical Requirements Document (TORG) that specifies design standards and methods to be used in process design for a project.
    TorgDataSource
    Interface for loading Technical Requirements Documents (TORG) from various data sources.
    TorgManager
    Manager class for applying Technical Requirements Documents (TORG) to process systems.
  • Classes in neqsim.process.mechanicaldesign.torg used by neqsim.process.mechanicaldesign.torg
    Class
    Description
    CsvTorgDataSource
    CSV-based data source for loading Technical Requirements Documents (TORG).
    TechnicalRequirementsDocument
    Represents a Technical Requirements Document (TORG) that specifies design standards and methods to be used in process design for a project.
    TechnicalRequirementsDocument.Builder
    Builder for TechnicalRequirementsDocument.
    TechnicalRequirementsDocument.EnvironmentalConditions
    Environmental design conditions.
    TechnicalRequirementsDocument.MaterialSpecifications
    Material specifications.
    TechnicalRequirementsDocument.SafetyFactors
    Safety factors for design calculations.
    TorgDataSource
    Interface for loading Technical Requirements Documents (TORG) from various data sources.
    TorgManager
    Manager class for applying Technical Requirements Documents (TORG) to process systems.
